pages.text: $(item)Frog Legs$() are a Meat Food item that can be obtain by $(thing)fishing$() in Plains, Swamp or Forest.$(br)They have a Meat value of 0.5.$(br2)They can be used to make a $(item)Froggle Bunwich$() in the $(pot)Crock Pot$().
$(item)Cooked Frog Legs$() are cooked from $(item)Frog Legs$().$(br2)It can also be used to make the $(item)Froggle Bunwich$(), which is cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$().
